definition: Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中[Guan1 zhong1] plain
the Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中 plain

sentences.english: Legend originated in the Weihe River in Shaanxi in central tribal leaders.
sentences.chinese: 传说起源于陕西中部渭河流域的部落领袖。

sentences.english: The characteristics of flood disaster evolution in the Weihe River valley are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了渭河流域洪水灾害的环流形势演变特征。

sentences.english: The Hu-Du bamboo forests were famous ancient ecological resources in the Wei River area.
sentences.chinese: 鄠杜竹林是古渭河流域的著名生态资源。

sentences.english: The flow capacity of the Weihe river during the flood period dramatically decreased, which makes the situation of flood controlling serious.
sentences.chinese: 洪水期渭河过流能力急剧减小，防洪能力十分严峻。

sentences.english: According to these characteristics, the problems of Weihe were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 针对这些特征，分析了渭河下游目前存在的主要问题。

sentences.english: The Weihe River is a largest tributary to the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 渭河是黄河最大的一级支流。

definition: Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中 plain
name of several rivers/North Luo river, tributary of Wei river 渭河|渭河[Wei4 He2] in Shaanxi
Huangshui River, upper reaches of the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2], flowing through Qinghai and Gansu
Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Lantian county in Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1], Shaanxi
Qingshuihe county in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia
old road/old way/old course (of a river)
Hancheng city and county in Shaanxi
